org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.transactions

Class TransactionProcessor<CHANGE_MANAGER extends java.lang.AutoCloseable,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>

  • java.lang.Object
    • IsolationBladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.transactions.TransactionProcessor<CHANGE_MANAGER,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>
  • Type Parameters:
    CHANGE_MANAGER - Used when processing a transaction to update the state.
    IMMUTABLE_STATE - The type of state.
    IMMUTABLE_CHANGES - The transaction changes passed to the subscribers of the validation and change RequestBus instances.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesProcessor

    public abstract class TransactionProcessor<CHANGE_MANAGER extends java.lang.AutoCloseable,IMMUTABLE_STATE,IMMUTABLE_CHANGES>
extends IsolationBladeBase
    The TransactionProcessor blade uses 2 reactors, an IsolationReactor to ensure transaction isolation, and a CommonReactor for transaction processing and for use by the validation and change RequesBus instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      RequestBus<IMMUTABLE_CHANGES> changeBus
      The RequestBus used to signal the changes made by a validated transaction.
      protected IMMUTABLE_STATE immutableState
      The state as of the completion of the last successful transaction.
      NonBlockingReactor parentReactor
      The reactor used for transaction processing and by the two RequestBus instances.
      RequestBus<IMMUTABLE_CHANGES> validationBus
      The RequestBus used to validate the changes made by a transaction.

      IMMUTABLE_STATE getImmutableState()
      Returns the state as of the completion of the last successful transaction.
      protected abstract CHANGE_MANAGER newChangeManager()
      Creates the change manager to be used to manage the updates of a single transaction.
      protected abstract IMMUTABLE_CHANGES newChanges()
      Creates the immutable changes to be used to validate and signal the changes made by the transaction.
      protected abstract void newImmutableState()
      Update the current state after a transaction has been validated.
